action.name: Set text
action.param: statusLog.Text & " completed!" & newline & "Logging in as " & nickname & "..."

action.name: Set text
action.param: statusLog.Text & " error!" & newline & "Could not connecto to server!"

action.name: Set text
action.param: statusLog.Text & newline & backend.PeerAlias & " has been disconnected from service."

sub-events.comment: Set cursor style, if it's above text or thumb image
Play specific track on playlist by clicking on it's thumbnail image or text
With this function I'm getting track info from YouTube API. Video ID has to be passed as parameter 0
Saving JSON response and storing it's values inside array

action.name: Set text
action.param: statusLog.Text & newline & nickname & " just queued " & Items.At(Items.Width-1,1) & " into the playlist."

sub-events.comment: If this is first queued song, play it immediately

action.name: Set text
action.param: "STATS: " & backend.PeerCount & users & " connected / " & sharedSongs & songs & " shared."
